definitions.definition: A device using gunpowder and other chemicals which, when lit, emits a combination of coloured flames , sparks , whistles or bangs , and sometimes made to rocket high into the sky before exploding, used for entertainment or celebration.
examples: Commercial firework displays are commonly launched from boats or other vessels
Fireworks went off after Australia won the World Cup.

main_definition: A device using gunpowder and other chemicals which, when lit, emits a combination of coloured flames , sparks , whistles or bangs , and sometimes made to rocket high into the sky before exploding, used for entertainment or celebration.
